# svg-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                    | Type                      | Default          |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `fill`          | `fill`            | Fill color applied to slotted <svg>. Defaults to 'currentColor'.                                                                               | `string`                  | `'currentColor'` |
| `height`        | `height`          | Height applied to slotted <svg> (px). Omit/0 to leave as-is.                                                                                   | `number`                  | `undefined`      |
| `svgAriaHidden` | `svg-aria-hidden` | Forwarded to the slotted <svg> as aria-hidden. Use "true" or "false". Using a different prop name avoids clashing with HTMLElement.ariaHidden. | `"false" \| "true"`       | `undefined`      |
| `svgAriaLabel`  | `svg-aria-label`  | Forwarded to the slotted <svg> as aria-label (avoids clashing with HTMLElement.ariaLabel).                                                     | `string`                  | `undefined`      |
| `svgMargin`     | `svg-margin`      | Optional margin wrapper around the slotted <svg>: '', 'left', or 'right'.                                                                      | `"" \| "left" \| "right"` | `''`             |
| `width`         | `width`           | Width applied to slotted <svg> (px). Omit/0 to leave as-is.                                                                                    | `number`                  | `undefined`      |
